name: Smoking Kills (HornetWithaGun, Jirbb, Josion)
description:
Smoking Kills was made over a 48 hour period for the 2022 CDG Jam by a team of 4 student developers. The Theme was "It was there, and then it wasn't." We took this theme literally, and you if you play well, no one should see you at all. ;)

Controls: Use WASD to move the character and space to transform yourself into smoke

Diversifiers: "Circa 1920", "Gooey GUI"

Team name: Table Sandwich

Members: Ashley (themoisturizer#5014), Ben (Hornet#7338), Jordan (Jirb#1314), Josh (Josion#2383)
